original_text: Then Jesus told his disciples a story. He wanted to teach them that they must go on praying always. They must not get tired.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들에게 항상 기도하고 낙심하지 말아야 할 것을 비유로 말씀하여

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus told his disciples a story.
that they must go on praying always.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 항상 계속 기도해야 한다는 것을.
